projects: [{"title":"Economics Association","start_date":"Jun 2015","description":"I was a member of an informal association started by the students of Economics Department of Sri Venkateswara College, whereby every week we pick up a contentious economic issue like 25 years of liberalization, Union budgets, etc. and we discussed upon the same."}]

honors_and_awards.title: Academic Achievements - Sri Venkateswara College 1st and 2nd year
honors_and_awards.description: I stood 2nd in both my first year as well as the second year of my Bachelors Program. I scored 100/100 in the paper of Intermediate Microeconomics-1, 97/100 in the paper of Introductory Econometrics, 97/100 in the paper of Algebra and Calculus-1. I had an aggregate percentage of 82 for all 6 semesters.

honors_and_awards.title: Academic Achievements - J.H. Ambani School, class 12.
honors_and_awards.description: I was issued certificates from school for scoring the highest marks in Mathematics and Economics in class 12 and for being third overall. I scored 99/100 in Mathematics and 98/100 in Economics.

honors_and_awards.title: Computer Wizard Award
honors_and_awards.description: I was awarded the Computer Wizard award from the school in order to appreciate my skills in PowerPoint Presentation making and Videography & Video Editing. I have represented school at various district and state level competitions in documentary movie making and ppt competitions.
